original: sring mo dag de la lus zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lus kyis nyes par spyod pa gsum mi bya bar bstan to //
analyzed: sring mo dag de la lus zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lus kyis nyes par spyod pa gsum mi bya bar bstan to //
translated: “Sisters, in the phrase ‘with the body,’ the Blessed One taught that one should not engage in the three types of physical misdeeds.

original: ngag ces bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ngag gis nyes par spyod pa bzhi mi bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: ngag ces bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ngag gis nyes par spyod pa bzhi mi bya ba bstan to //
translated: In the phrase ‘with speech,’ the Blessed One taught that one should not engage in the four types of verbal misdeeds.

original: yid kyis zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yid kyis nyes par spyod pa gsum mi bya ba bstan to /
analyzed: yid kyis zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yid kyis nyes par spyod pa gsum mi bya ba bstan to /
translated: In the phrase ‘with the mind,’ the Blessed One taught that one should not engage in the three types of mental misdeeds.

original: sdig pa mi bya zhing zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: sdig pa mi bya zhing zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes bya ba bstan to //
translated: In the phrase ‘do not commit any evil,’ the Blessed One taught that one should not engage in any evil at all.

original: 'jig rten kun la zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar len pa'i phung po thams cad bstan to //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun la zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar len pa'i phung po thams cad bstan to //
translated: In the phrase ‘in the world,’ the Blessed One taught all the appropriated aggregates.

original: yongs 'dzin zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs 'dzin rnam pa gsum bstan te /
analyzed: yongs 'dzin zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs 'dzin rnam pa gsum bstan te /
translated: In the phrase ‘clinging,’ the Blessed One taught three types of clinging:

original: 'dod chags kyis yongs 'dzin dang / zhe sdang gis yongs 'dzin dang / gti mug gis yongs 'dzin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis yongs 'dzin dang / zhe sdang gis yongs 'dzin dang / gti mug gis yongs 'dzin no //
translated: clinging through desire, clinging through hatred, and clinging through ignorance.

original: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas ji tsam gyis tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don kyang rnam par phye ba de tsam gyis srog chags khri nyes stong gis bden pa ngag mthong ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas ji tsam gyis tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don kyang rnam par phye ba de tsam gyis srog chags khri nyes stong gis bden pa ngag mthong ste /
translated: As many as ten thousand living beings saw the truths,

original: kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
analyzed: kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
translated: and some realized the fruit of stream-entry,

original: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
analyzed: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
translated: some the fruit of once-returning,

original: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
analyzed: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
translated: some the fruit of non-returning,

original: kha cig gis ni rab du byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
analyzed: kha cig gis ni rab du byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
translated: and some went forth and, by destroying the defilements, realized the state of an arhat.

original: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed /🔽kha cig gis ni rang byang chub tu sems bskyed /
analyzed: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed / kha cig gis ni rang byang chub tu sems bskyed /
translated: Some generated the thought of the enlightenment of a śrāvaka,🔽some the thought of the enlightenment of a pratyekabuddha,

original: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @92b sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
analyzed: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @92b sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
translated: and some the thought of the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment of a buddha.

original: 'khor phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bkod do //
analyzed: 'khor phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bkod do //
translated: He then established the majority of the assembly in the Buddha, in the Dharma, and in the Saṅgha.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa 'khor de dag phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bkod nas stan las langs te song ngo //🔽de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa lam pas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis b'a r'a na sa'i drang srong smra ba ri dags kyi nags su 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa 'khor de dag phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bkod nas stan las langs te song ngo // de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa lam pas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis b'a r'a na sa'i drang srong smra ba ri dags kyi nags su 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan
translated: Then Venerable Aśvajit, having established the majority of the assembly in the Buddha, in the Dharma, and in the Saṅgha, rose from his seat and departed.

original: pa bskor ba rjes su bskor to //
analyzed: pa bskor ba rjes su bskor to //
translated: At that time, Venerable Aśvajit turned the wheel of Dharma in accordance with the Dharma, in three turnings and twelve aspects, just as the Blessed One had done in the Ṛṣipatana Deer Park in Vārāṇasī, with regard to the four truths of the noble ones.🔽Then the Blessed One said to the monks:

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Monks,

original: dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi dge slong sems bsgyur ba la mkhas pa'i nang na 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi dge slong sems bsgyur ba la mkhas pa'i nang na 'di lta ste /
translated: “Monks, among my disciples who are monks skilled in changing their minds,

original: lam pa 'di mchog yin no //
analyzed: lam pa 'di mchog yin no //
translated: this is the foremost.

original: de lta bas na chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs so //
analyzed: de lta bas na chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs so //
translated: Therefore, this is excluded from those who have this kind of Dharma.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang / de'i shas che ba dang / de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang / de'i shas che ba dang / de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas /
translated: Then the Blessed One, having praised the desire for training, respect for training, and the austerity of training, spoke in a way that accorded with, was not contrary to, and was consistent with the Dharma.

original: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: He said to the monks,

original: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la /
translated: “Monks, therefore, the previous was a rule,

original: 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
translated: but this is a concession.

original: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
analyzed: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
translated: My disciples should recite this basis of training for the rules of the monastic code:

original: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pas dge slong ma la ston na chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes gnang ba mdzad de /
analyzed: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pas dge slong ma la ston na chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes gnang ba mdzad de /
translated: Also, any monk who teaches nuns without being appointed by the community, except for one who has such qualities, commits an offense entailing confession.

original: yul ni mnyan yod /
analyzed: yul ni mnyan yod /
translated: The place was Śrāvastī.

original: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa lam pa /
analyzed: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa lam pa /
translated: The person was the venerable Pūrṇa.

original: nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa ni med do //🔽de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa ni med do // de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am /
translated: There was no affliction or fault.

original: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //🔽dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o // dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In that case, any monk means the group of six or anyone like them.

original: de bzhin gshags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis so //
translated: The community means the community of disciples of the Tathāgata.

original: ma bskos par zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so //🔽dge slong ma la zhes bya ba @93a * //
analyzed: ma bskos par zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so // dge slong ma la zhes bya ba @93a * //
translated: Without being appointed means by a two-part procedure of proposal and proclamation.

original: ni chos 'di pa la'o //
analyzed: ni chos 'di pa la'o //
translated: To nuns means to those who are Dharma followers.

original: ston na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab bo //
analyzed: ston na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab bo //
translated: To teach means to teach superior morality, superior mind, and superior wisdom.

original: chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni cha dang ldan pa lam pa'i chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa gzhag ste'o /
analyzed: chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni cha dang ldan pa lam pa'i chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa gzhag ste'o /
translated: Except for those who have the Dharma of the stage of the path that is a part of that, that is, except for those who have the Dharma of the stage of the path that is a part of that.

original: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One commits a downfall means:

original: sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags ngan song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu sred bar byed /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags ngan song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu sred bar byed /
translated: One causes sentient beings to fall into the lower realms, the hells, the animal realm, and the realm of hungry ghosts.

original: 'tshed par byed /
analyzed: 'tshed par byed /
translated: One causes them to be boiled and cooked.

original: ltung bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ltung bar byed pa'o //
translated: One causes them to fall.

original: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
translated: Moreover, as long as that downfall is not confessed and revealed, it obscures virtuous dharmas.

original: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is called a downfall.

original: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does one commit a downfall?

original: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, the characteristics of this downfall should be understood through the main part of the downfall, the preparatory stage, the sub-preparatory stage, the downfalls, the non-downfalls, the training, and the restoration.

original: de la 'dir yang dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: de la 'dir yang dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
translated: The main part of the downfall is as follows:

original: dge slong dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong bco lnga pa la mtshams kyi nang du spro bar byas te /
analyzed: dge slong dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong bco lnga pa la mtshams kyi nang du spro bar byas te /
translated: A monk has been invited to the confession ceremony on the fifteenth day by the community of monks within the boundaries of the monastery.

original: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis ma bskos pa dang / bskos pa chos lnga dang / ston pa phyi ma'i yon tan de dag las gcig dang yang mi ldan pa dang / ma bskos pa yon tan de dag dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung bas dge slong ma la ston na ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis ma bskos pa dang / bskos pa chos lnga dang / ston pa phyi ma'i yon tan de dag las gcig dang yang mi ldan pa dang / ma bskos pa yon tan de dag dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung bas dge slong ma la ston na ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: If he teaches the nuns without having been appointed by a formal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement, or if he teaches the nuns even though he has been appointed but does not have the five qualities, or does not have the qualities of a teacher of the latter doctrine, or if he teaches the nuns without having been appointed, even if he has the qualities, then he commits the root downfall of teaching without having been appointed.

original: 'dir dge slong ma'i ston pa dge 'dun gyis spus bdams pa dang / bsko ba'i rnam par gzhag pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir dge slong ma'i ston pa dge 'dun gyis spus bdams pa dang / bsko ba'i rnam par gzhag pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Here is the procedure for the selection and appointment of the preceptor nun by the Saṅgha of monks.

original: dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa dge slong ma'i ston par bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa dge slong ma'i ston par bskor bar bya'o //
translated: “A monk who possesses five qualities should be appointed as the preceptor of nuns.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu dang / grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa dang / des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu dang / grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa dang / des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
translated: He is ethical, learned, a senior monk who is like a regent, he speaks the local language, and he has not been censured by the Saṅgha.

original: gal te sun phyung na yang /
analyzed: gal te sun phyung na yang /
translated: If he has been censured,

original: des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa'o //
analyzed: des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa'o //
translated: he has rectified that offense in accordance with the Dharma.

original: de la tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i pham par 'gyur ba ma byung ba'o //
analyzed: de la tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i pham par 'gyur ba ma byung ba'o //
translated: He is ethical in that he has not committed any of the defeating offenses.

original: mang du thos pa ni @93b 'dul ba dang mdo sde dang ma mo 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: mang du thos pa ni @93b 'dul ba dang mdo sde dang ma mo 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He is learned in the Vinaya, the discourses, and the mnemonic lists.

original: gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo nyi shu las mi nyung ba'o //
analyzed: gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo nyi shu las mi nyung ba'o //
translated: He is a senior monk who is like a regent, having been fully ordained for at least twenty years.

original: grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa ni /
translated: One who speaks the language of the city

original: rigs pa dang grol bar smra ba'o //🔽des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
analyzed: rigs pa dang grol bar smra ba'o // des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
translated: is one who speaks logically and is liberated.🔽If he does not offend a nun by physical contact,

original: gal te sun phyung na yang des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa ni lus kyis reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gal te sun phyung na yang des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa ni lus kyis reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba med pa'o //
translated: and if he does offend, he restores that downfall in accordance with the teaching. This is the absence of the offense of a nun’s partial defeat that is a serious offense.

original: chos lnga po de dag las gzhi ni nges pa yin no //
analyzed: chos lnga po de dag las gzhi ni nges pa yin no //
translated: The basis of these five is definite.

original: mang du thos pa ni med na so sor thar pa'i mdo thon pa yang bsko'o //
analyzed: mang du thos pa ni med na so sor thar pa'i mdo thon pa yang bsko'o //
translated: If there is no one who is learned, then one who has mastered the Sūtra of Individual Liberation is appointed.

original: de yang med na dge slong ma'i pham par 'gyur ba brgyad dang / lci ba'i chos brgyad po dag ston nus pa yang bsko'o //
analyzed: de yang med na dge slong ma'i pham par 'gyur ba brgyad dang / lci ba'i chos brgyad po dag ston nus pa yang bsko'o //
translated: If there is no one who has mastered that, then one who is able to teach the eight defeats and eight serious offenses of a nun is appointed.

original: de yang med na dge slong ma'i ston pa phyi ma ni dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
analyzed: de yang med na dge slong ma'i ston pa phyi ma ni dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
translated: If there is no such nun, then the next teacher of the nuns is a fully ordained monk who is an elder and regent like Śīlapālita, who speaks the language of the city. He should not have defiled the nuns with physical contact.

original: gal te sun phyung na yang des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te sun phyung na yang des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa yin la /
translated: If he has defiled them, then he should have confessed that downfall in accordance with the Dharma.

original: sring mo dag ci khyed cag dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs sam /
analyzed: sring mo dag ci khyed cag dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs sam /
translated: “Sisters, is the community of nuns complete?

original: yongs su dag gam /
analyzed: yongs su dag gam /
translated: Are you pure?🔽Are you in harmony?

original: mthun nam / kha na ma tho ba med dam /
analyzed: mthun nam / kha na ma tho ba med dam /
translated: Are you without offense?

original: byed cag la dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa gang zag 'ga' zhig ston par mi byed dam /
analyzed: byed cag la dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa gang zag 'ga' zhig ston par mi byed dam /
translated: Has the community not appointed any individual to be a teacher?

original: khyed cag la ston pa'i gang zag ni 'ga' zhig dge 'dun las 'ong ngo //
analyzed: khyed cag la ston pa'i gang zag ni 'ga' zhig dge 'dun las 'ong ngo //
translated: The individual who is your teacher will come from the community.

original: khyed cag la dge slong 'ga' yang ston par mi spro'o //
analyzed: khyed cag la dge slong 'ga' yang ston par mi spro'o //
translated: None of you are eager to be a teacher of nuns.

original: khyed cag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ni dge 'dun las so //
analyzed: khyed cag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ni dge 'dun las so //
translated: Your instructions and further teachings will come from the community.”

original: srid mo dag gis bag yod par sgrubs shig ces bya ba de ston nus pa bsko'o //
analyzed: srid mo dag gis bag yod par sgrubs shig ces bya ba de ston nus pa bsko'o //
translated: The nuns’ teacher is appointed to show them how to be conscientious.

original: mang du thos pa'i yan lag de yang snga ma yod pa nyid yin na gnyis pa bskor mi rung la gnyis pa yod na gsum pa bskor mi rung zhing gsum pa yod na bzhi pa bskor mi rung ngo //
analyzed: mang du thos pa'i yan lag de yang snga ma yod pa nyid yin na gnyis pa bskor mi rung la gnyis pa yod na gsum pa bskor mi rung zhing gsum pa yod na bzhi pa bskor mi rung ngo //
translated: If the nuns already have the first requisite, it is not right to appoint them a second one. If they have the second, it is not right to appoint them a third. If they have the third, it is not right to appoint them a fourth.

original: dge slong ma'i ston pa de lta bu bsko ba ni dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong bco lnga pa la /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i ston pa de lta bu bsko ba ni dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong bco lnga pa la /
translated: The appointment of a teacher for the nuns should be done by the saṅgha on the fifteenth day of the confession ceremony.

original: dge 'dun gso sbyong byas pa'i rjes la las kyi mtshams de nyid kyi nang du dge 'dun las dang 'dun pas 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa thams cad kyis spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun gso sbyong byas pa'i rjes la las kyi mtshams de nyid kyi nang du dge 'dun las dang 'dun pas 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa thams cad kyis spro bar bya ste /
translated: After the saṅgha has performed the confession ceremony, all the members of the saṅgha who are present and in agreement should be enthusiastic about the appointment.

original: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis bsko bar @94a * //
analyzed: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis bsko bar @94a * //
translated: The appointment should be made with a proposal and a single formal procedure of the saṅgha.

original: bya'o // cho ga de dag las 'das na las mi 'chags so //
analyzed: bya'o // cho ga de dag las 'das na las mi 'chags so //
translated: If the procedure is not done according to these rules, the appointment is invalid.

original: dge slong dge 'dun gyis gso spyod bco lnga pas mtshams kyi nang du spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong dge 'dun gyis gso spyod bco lnga pas mtshams kyi nang du spro bar bya ste /
translated: The saṅgha of monks should be enthusiastic about the appointment on the fifteenth day of the confession ceremony.

original: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis ma bskos pa dge slong ma la ston pa la na smad pa med do //🔽bskos pa chos lnga dang ston pa phyi ma'i yon tan de dag las gcig dang mi ldan pa dge slong ma la ston pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis ma bskos pa dge slong ma la ston pa la na smad pa med do // bskos pa chos lnga dang ston pa phyi ma'i yon tan de dag las gcig dang mi ldan pa dge slong ma la ston pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if the monk is not appointed by a formal act with proposal.🔽There is no offense if the monk is appointed, but he does not have one of the five qualities, or the nun does not have one of the five qualities that make her worthy of respect.

original: ma bskos pa yon tan de dag dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung dge slong ma la ston pa la na smad pa med do //🔽dge slong ma chos 'di pa la bsnyen par rdzogs pa can ma nyams pa rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig gam /
analyzed: ma bskos pa yon tan de dag dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung dge slong ma la ston pa la na smad pa med do // dge slong ma chos 'di pa la bsnyen par rdzogs pa can ma nyams pa rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig gam /
translated: There is no offense if the monk is not appointed, but he has the five qualities, or the nun has the five qualities that make her worthy of respect.🔽There is no offense if the monk teaches the nuns the Monastic Code, or if he teaches the nuns the discourses, or if he teaches the nuns the summaries.

original: gnyis sam / rab tu mang bo 'am /🔽dge 'dun du langs pa la ston pa la na smad ba med do //
analyzed: gnyis sam / rab tu mang bo 'am / dge 'dun du langs pa la ston pa la na smad ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if the monk teaches the nuns the Monastic Code, or if he teaches the discourses, or if he teaches the summaries, and the nuns are fully ordained according to the true teaching, are not degenerate, and are in their proper state, whether they are one, two, or many, or whether they are a gathering of the Sangha.

original: lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab lung nyid du gtogs pa gang yang rung ba'i ston pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab lung nyid du gtogs pa gang yang rung ba'i ston pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if the monk teaches the nuns the Monastic Code, or if he teaches the discourses, or if he teaches the summaries, and the nuns are endowed with superior morality, superior qualities, and superior wisdom.

original: dge slong chos bla ma'i mthu dang ldan pa ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: dge slong chos bla ma'i mthu dang ldan pa ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: Except for the monk Dharmodgata, there is no blame in being sick.

original: sngar bskos pa ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: sngar bskos pa ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: Except for the one who was previously appointed, there is no blame in being sick.

original: dge 'dun du ma langs pa'i gnas na ston par 'os pa yod pa la dge slong mas gsol ba ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: dge 'dun du ma langs pa'i gnas na ston par 'os pa yod pa la dge slong mas gsol ba ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: In a place where the Saṅgha has not risen, except for the monk who is worthy to teach and has been requested by the nuns, there is no blame.

original: 'di'i byed la po ni ma bskos par dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i byed la po ni ma bskos par dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
translated: The perpetrator of this is one who teaches the nuns without being appointed.

original: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
translated: Here, the basis is completed by five factors:

original: gso sbyong bco lnga po de nyid la mtshams gyi nang du dge 'dun gyis spro bar byas te /
analyzed: gso sbyong bco lnga po de nyid la mtshams gyi nang du dge 'dun gyis spro bar byas te /
translated: On that very fifteenth day of the confession ceremony, the Saṅgha is delighted within the boundary.

original: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis ma bskos pa dang / bskos pa chos lnga dang ston pa phyi ma'i yon tan de dag las /
analyzed: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis ma bskos pa dang / bskos pa chos lnga dang ston pa phyi ma'i yon tan de dag las /
translated: Without being appointed by a proposal and a dual action, and being appointed with the five qualities of teaching the latter qualities of the Buddha,

original: gcig dang yang mi ldan pa dang / ma bskos pa yon tan de dag dang ldan yang rung pa dang / dge slong ma rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig la sogs pa dang / sde snod gsum gyi chos gang yang rung ba ston pa'o //
analyzed: gcig dang yang mi ldan pa dang / ma bskos pa yon tan de dag dang ldan yang rung pa dang / dge slong ma rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig la sogs pa dang / sde snod gsum gyi chos gang yang rung ba ston pa'o //
translated: If he teaches a single fully ordained nun or more, and if he teaches any of the teachings of the three collections,

original: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
analyzed: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
translated: then if he is incomplete in those branches, he is censured, as appropriate.

original: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
translated: The downfall through transgression is a minor offense.

original: ji srid du ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi lam thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
analyzed: ji srid du ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi lam thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
translated: As long as he has not been appointed, if he begins the preparations for teaching, he commits a minor offense as long as he has not reached the actual basis.

original: dngos @94b gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
analyzed: dngos @94b gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
translated: For each preparation that he begins, he commits a minor offense.

original: dge slong ma ma chags pa dang / nyams pa dang / bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa mtshan mi mthun pa dag la nyes byas so //
analyzed: dge slong ma ma chags pa dang / nyams pa dang / bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa mtshan mi mthun pa dag la nyes byas so //
translated: If he teaches a nun who is not attracted to him, who is degenerate, or who has not completed the full ordination, or if he teaches someone whose gender is indeterminate, he commits a minor offense.

original: sde snod gsum gyi chos lung du gtogs pa nyid ma yin pa la nyes byas so //
analyzed: sde snod gsum gyi chos lung du gtogs pa nyid ma yin pa la nyes byas so //
translated: If he teaches a Dharma that is not included in the three collections, he commits a minor offense.

original: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i lhung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i lhung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
translated: The downfall of preparation for preparation is a minor offense.

original: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
analyzed: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
translated: As many preparations as there are, there are that many preparations for preparation.

original: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te /
translated: The preparation for preparation is a minor offense.

original: nyes byas phra mo'o //
analyzed: nyes byas phra mo'o //
translated: It is a minor offense.

original: lhung ba med pa ni dge slong chos bla ma'i mthu dang ldan pa la lhung ba med do //
analyzed: lhung ba med pa ni dge slong chos bla ma'i mthu dang ldan pa la lhung ba med do //
translated: There is no downfall for a fully ordained monk who is a master of the Dharma.

original: sngar bskos pa la lhung ba med do //
analyzed: sngar bskos pa la lhung ba med do //
translated: There is no downfall for one who has been previously appointed.

original: dge 'dun du ma langs pa'i gnas na ston par 'os pa la dge slong mas gsol te bstan pa la lhung ba med do //
analyzed: dge 'dun du ma langs pa'i gnas na ston par 'os pa la dge slong mas gsol te bstan pa la lhung ba med do //
translated: There is no downfall for a nun who requests a nun to teach in a place where the community has not been established.

original: de la gsol ba 'debs pa'i dge slong ma dag la yang lhung ba med do //
analyzed: de la gsol ba 'debs pa'i dge slong ma dag la yang lhung ba med do //
translated: There is no downfall for the nuns who are requested to teach.

original: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la lhung ba med do //
analyzed: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la lhung ba med do //
translated: There is no downfall for a beginner, for one who is insane, for one whose mind is disturbed, or for one who is overwhelmed by pain.

original: bslab bar bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du ma bskos par snyon pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bslab bar bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du ma bskos par snyon pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
translated: The training rule is that a monk should train in not relying on any person in any situation who is not appointed as a teacher.

original: ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed 'di nyid kyi skabs nas dge slong ma'i ston pa bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed 'di nyid kyi skabs nas dge slong ma'i ston pa bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: In the context of this very downfall of not being appointed as a teacher, it is said that a monk should be appointed as a teacher of nuns. This is how it is done.

original: dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa dge slong ma'i ston par bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa dge slong ma'i ston par bskor bar bya'o //
translated: A monk who has five qualities should be appointed as a teacher of nuns.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu dang / grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa dang / des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu dang / grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa dang / des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
translated: He is ethical, learned, a senior monk, speaks the local language, and has not been defiled by sexual misconduct with a nun.

original: gal te sum phyung na yang /
analyzed: gal te sum phyung na yang /
translated: Even if he has been defiled,

original: des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa'o //
analyzed: des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa'o //
translated: he has made amends for that offense in accordance with the Teaching.

original: chos lnga po de dag las bzhi ni nges pa yin no //
analyzed: chos lnga po de dag las bzhi ni nges pa yin no //
translated: Four of these five are certain.

original: mang du thos pa ni mad na so sor thar pa'i mdo thon pa yang bsko'o //
analyzed: mang du thos pa ni mad na so sor thar pa'i mdo thon pa yang bsko'o //
translated: If there is no one who has heard much, then one who has mastered the Sūtra of Individual Liberation is appointed.

original: de yang med na dge slong ma'i pham par 'gyur ba brgyad dang / lci ba'i chos brgyas po dag ston nus pa yang bsko'o //
analyzed: de yang med na dge slong ma'i pham par 'gyur ba brgyad dang / lci ba'i chos brgyas po dag ston nus pa yang bsko'o //
translated: If there is no such person, then one who is able to teach the eight defeats and the one hundred and twelve heavy rules for the nuns is appointed.

original: de yang med na dag slong ma'i ston pa phyi ma ni dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu grong khyer ba'i skad dang @95a * //
analyzed: de yang med na dag slong ma'i ston pa phyi ma ni dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu grong khyer ba'i skad dang @95a * //
translated: If there is no such person, then a later teacher of the nuns is appointed. This is a fully ordained monk who is ethical, like an elder regent, and who speaks the language of the town.

original: ldan pa des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phung zhing /
analyzed: ldan pa des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phung zhing /
translated: He should not be one who has defiled the nuns by physical contact.

original: gal te sun phyung na yang des lhung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te sun phyung na yang des lhung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa yin la /
translated: Even if he has defiled them, if he has properly confessed that downfall,

original: sring mo dag ci khyed cag dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs sam /
analyzed: sring mo dag ci khyed cag dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs sam /
translated: “Sisters, is the assembly of the community of nuns complete?

original: yongs su dag gam /
analyzed: yongs su dag gam /
translated: Are you pure in this matter?

original: mthun nam / kha na ma tho ba med dam khyed cag la dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig ston par mi byed dam /
analyzed: mthun nam / kha na ma tho ba med dam khyed cag la dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig ston par mi byed dam /
translated: Is it suitable? Is there any offense? Are there any individuals who have not been appointed by the Saṅgha to teach you?

original: khyed cag la ston pa'i gang zag ni 'ga' zhig dge 'dun las 'ong ngo //
analyzed: khyed cag la ston pa'i gang zag ni 'ga' zhig dge 'dun las 'ong ngo //
translated: Your teachers will come from the Saṅgha.

original: khyed cag la dge slong 'ga' yang ston par mi spro'o //
analyzed: khyed cag la dge slong 'ga' yang ston par mi spro'o //
translated: There are no bhikṣus who are willing to teach you.

original: khyed cag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ni dge 'dun las so //
analyzed: khyed cag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ni dge 'dun las so //
translated: Your instructions and teachings will come from the Saṅgha.

original: sring mo dag gis bag yod par sgrubs shig ces bya ba de ston nus pa bsko'o //
analyzed: sring mo dag gis bag yod par sgrubs shig ces bya ba de ston nus pa bsko'o //
translated: Sisters, practice heedfully.”

original: 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste /
translated: This is how the appointment should be made.

original: gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pas gso sbyong byas nas dge slong ma'i ston pa je dang por spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pas gso sbyong byas nas dge slong ma'i ston pa je dang por spro bar bya ste /
translated: On that very fifteenth day of the fortnight for purification, when the entire Saṅgha is present within the boundaries and has come to an agreement, the purification practice is performed. Then, the teacher of the bhikṣuṇīs is to be asked first if she is willing.

original: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong ma'i ston par spro 'am zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong ma'i ston par spro 'am zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: “Are you, named so-and-so, willing to be the teacher of the bhikṣuṇīs?”

original: gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: If he is willing, he should say, ‘I am willing.’

original: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //🔽'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o // 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: “After that, one monk should make a proposal to the saṅgha and perform the procedure.🔽This is how it should be done.

original: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: He should sit down and say this:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: ‘Venerables, please listen!

original: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma'i ston par spro na /
analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma'i ston par spro na /
translated: This monk so-and-so is willing to be the instructor of the nuns.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi pa dge slong ma'i ston par bskos te /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi pa dge slong ma'i ston par bskos te /
translated: If the time is right for the saṅgha and it is acceptable to you, then I ask the saṅgha to approve the appointment of monk so-and-so as the instructor of the nuns.

original: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma la ston to //
analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma la ston to //
translated: Monk so-and-so will be the instructor of the nuns.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The procedure is as follows.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: ‘Venerables, please listen!

original: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /
analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /
translated: This monk so-and-so

original: dge slong ma'i ston par spro na /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i ston par spro na /
translated: is willing to be the instructor of the nuns.

original: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i ston par bskos te /🔽dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma la ston na /
analyzed: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i ston par bskos te / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma la ston na /
translated: Therefore, the Saṅgha has appointed the monk named so-and-so as the instructor of the nuns.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i ston par bsko bar bzod pa @95b de dag ni cang ma gsung shig //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i ston par bsko bar bzod pa @95b de dag ni cang ma gsung shig //
translated: If the Saṅgha is ready to appoint the monk named so-and-so as the instructor of the nuns,🔽let the revered ones consent.

original: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
analyzed: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
translated: Those who are not ready should speak.

original: dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i ston par bskos lags te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i ston par bskos lags te /
translated: The Saṅgha has appointed the monk named so-and-so as the instructor of the nuns.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: Since there is silence, that is how it will be done.

original: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //🔽ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gcig pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no // ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gcig pa bshad zin to /
translated: The amendment is the same as before.🔽The twenty-first root downfall, teaching without being appointed, is finished.

original: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: Vinaya Verses

original: 'dul ba kun las btus pa /
analyzed: 'dul ba kun las btus pa /
translated: Compendium of Discipline

original: bam po nyi shu bzhi ba //
analyzed: bam po nyi shu bzhi ba //
translated: Twentieth chapter

original: nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
analyzed: nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
translated: The origin of the downfall of teaching until the sun sets.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying in Śrāvastī, in Jeta’s Grove, in Anāthapiṇḍada’s park.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la dga' byed kyis dge slong ma la thoms shig / dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la dga' byed kyis dge slong ma la thoms shig / dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig //
translated: The Blessed One said to the venerable Nandī, “Nandī, teach the nuns, instruct the nuns,🔽and give them a Dharma talk.”

original: dge slong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog 'khor lnga brgya dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed gal ba der song ste phyin nas /
analyzed: dge slong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog 'khor lnga brgya dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed gal ba der song ste phyin nas /
translated: The nun Utpalavarṇā went to where the venerable Nandī was staying, and when she arrived,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
translated: she bowed her head at the feet of the venerable Nandī and sat down to one side.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis bsams pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis bsams pa /
translated: The venerable Nandī thought,

original: bud med ni shes rab chung ba yin no snyam nas des de la don dang tshig dang / yi ge mdor bsdus pa dag gis chos bstan to //
analyzed: bud med ni shes rab chung ba yin no snyam nas des de la don dang tshig dang / yi ge mdor bsdus pa dag gis chos bstan to //
translated: “Women are of little wisdom,” he thought, and he taught the Dharma to her in brief terms, in brief words, and in brief syllables.

original: de shes rab can yin pas gong nas gong du dri bar byed nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis lan btab cing /
analyzed: de shes rab can yin pas gong nas gong du dri bar byed nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis lan btab cing /
translated: Since she was wise, she asked more and more questions, and Venerable Nandaka answered them.

original: des de la ji tsam na nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab pa de tsam gyi bar du chos bstan nas /
analyzed: des de la ji tsam na nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab pa de tsam gyi bar du chos bstan nas /
translated: He taught the Dharma to her until the sun set.🔽They bowed low until their foreheads touched the feet of the nuns, got up from their seats, and left.

original: de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te dong ba dang / ji tsam na mnyan yod kyi sgo dag bcad par gyur nas dge slong ma rnams kyis sgo ba la sgo phye shig ces bos pa dang /
analyzed: de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te dong ba dang / ji tsam na mnyan yod kyi sgo dag bcad par gyur nas dge slong ma rnams kyis sgo ba la sgo phye shig ces bos pa dang /
translated: When they reached the gates of Śrāvastī, they found that the gates had been closed, so the nuns called out to the gatekeeper, “Open the gate!”

original: lde mig dag rgyal po'i pho brang du khyer zin to zhes zer ro //
analyzed: lde mig dag rgyal po'i pho brang du khyer zin to zhes zer ro //
translated: “The keys have been taken to the king’s palace,” he said.

original: de dag gis bsams pa /
analyzed: de dag gis bsams pa /
translated: They thought,

original: 'di nyid du 'khod do snyam snas /
analyzed: 'di nyid du 'khod do snyam snas /
translated: “We’ll stay right here.”

original: mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba na kun dga' ra ba zhig yod pa der de dag dong ngo //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis shing ljon pa yang rgan @96a * //
analyzed: mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba na kun dga' ra ba zhig yod pa der de dag dong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis shing ljon pa yang rgan @96a * //
translated: Not far from Śrāvastī there was a park. They went there.

original: rims kyis bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas /
analyzed: rims kyis bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas /
translated: The Blessed One said, “You should also appoint the trees in order of seniority.”🔽When they appointed the trees in order of seniority, a loud and great sound arose.

original: de dag shing ljon pa dag rgan rims kyis bskob na gcig la gcig 'bod pa'i sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen po byung ba mnyan yod 'joms par 'dod pa'i g-yon can lda brgya tsam de na bskungs pa dag gis thos nas /
analyzed: de dag shing ljon pa dag rgan rims kyis bskob na gcig la gcig 'bod pa'i sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen po byung ba mnyan yod 'joms par 'dod pa'i g-yon can lda brgya tsam de na bskungs pa dag gis thos nas /
translated: Some one hundred and fifty rogues who were hiding there, intending to destroy Śrāvastī, heard it.

original: de dag gis dge slong ma rnams btsun mo'i 'khor yin snyam nas gzhom par brtsams pa dang / autpa la'i mdog gis rgyal bu 'phags skyes po'i dpung sprul te /
analyzed: de dag gis dge slong ma rnams btsun mo'i 'khor yin snyam nas gzhom par brtsams pa dang / autpa la'i mdog gis rgyal bu 'phags skyes po'i dpung sprul te /
translated: Thinking that the nuns were the retinue of a queen, they prepared to attack them, but Utpalavarnā conjured up the army of Prince Virūḍhaka.

original: rnga brdungs pa dang / de dag skrag ste byer ro //
analyzed: rnga brdungs pa dang / de dag skrag ste byer ro //
translated: When the drum was beaten, they were frightened and dispersed.

original: dge slong ma dag nang par sngar langs te /
analyzed: dge slong ma dag nang par sngar langs te /
translated: The nuns got up early in the morning🔽and went to the park.

original: mnyan yod du zhugs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi chos 'dre ba dang lhag par 'dre shing tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa bzang ngo zhes tho 'tshams par byed nas /
analyzed: mnyan yod du zhugs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi chos 'dre ba dang lhag par 'dre shing tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa bzang ngo zhes tho 'tshams par byed nas /
translated: When they entered Śrāvastī, brahmins and householders saw them and said, “The monks of the Śākya child mix their Dharma with that of others and practice pure conduct in an excellent way.”🔽“Why do monks who have few concerns teach nuns until sunset?”

original: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston par byed ces smod par byed /
analyzed: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston par byed ces smod par byed /
translated: They criticized them,

original: phyar ka gtong bar byed /
analyzed: phyar ka gtong bar byed /
translated: and spread it about.

original: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
analyzed: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
translated: The monks asked the Blessed One about it,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
translated: and the Blessed One, having given this reason, this cause, this ground, gathered the saṅgha of monks

original: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la rmas nas /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la rmas nas /
translated: and questioned the venerable Nandīpāla:🔽“Is it true, Nandīpāla, that you do this?”

original: mi brtson pa dang / mi sbyor ba dang / ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad pa mdzad de /
analyzed: mi brtson pa dang / mi sbyor ba dang / ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad pa mdzad de /
translated: He condemned those who did not strive, who did not apply themselves, and who did not practice with discernment.

original: brtson pa dang / sbyor ba dang / brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
analyzed: brtson pa dang / sbyor ba dang / brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
translated: He praised those who did strive, who did apply themselves, and who did practice with discernment.

original: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
analyzed: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
translated: He saw ten benefits in establishing the precepts and thus established the following training rule for my hearers:

original: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bskos kyang /
analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bskos kyang /
translated: ‘Even if the saṅgha of monks has appointed you,

original: nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
analyzed: nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
translated: if you teach the nuns after sunset, you commit an offense.’

original: yul ni mnyan yod /
analyzed: yul ni mnyan yod /
translated: The place was Śrāvastī.

original: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed /
analyzed: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed /
translated: The person was the venerable Nandaka.

original: nyon mongs pa ni bag chags ma byang bas so sor ma brtags pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni bag chags ma byang bas so sor ma brtags pa /
translated: The affliction was the unpurified habitual tendencies.

original: nyes pa ni nyi ma nub kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa ni nyi ma nub kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
translated: The offense was teaching the nuns after sunset.

original: de la dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
analyzed: de la dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
translated: ‘Monk’ means someone who follows this doctrine.

original: dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan @96b thos kyi dge 'dun gyis so //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan @96b thos kyi dge 'dun gyis so //
translated: “The Saṅgha” means the Saṅgha of the Tathāgata’s disciples.

original: bskos kyang zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so //
analyzed: bskos kyang zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so //
translated: “Even if appointed” means by a two-part procedure consisting of an announcement and a motion.

original: nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Until sunset” means

original: nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab par ro //
analyzed: nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab par ro //
translated: until the time of sunset.

original: dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
translated: “A nun” means a nun who is a member of this Dharma and Vinaya.

original: ston na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab po /
analyzed: ston na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab po /
translated: “Teaches” means teaches the higher morality, the higher mind, and the higher wisdom.

original: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: “Offense” means as previously explained.

original: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is an offense here?

original: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, the offense should be understood by the characteristics of the basic offense, the preparatory action, the subsequent action, the offense, the absence of an offense, the training, and the amendment.

original: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong mtshan thog thag tu cho ston pa ma gtogs pas dge slong gis gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i dus na /
analyzed: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong mtshan thog thag tu cho ston pa ma gtogs pas dge slong gis gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i dus na /
translated: Here, the main downfalls are presented as follows.🔽🔽A monk who is not observing the rite of the entire day of the virtuous🔽should not open the door of the temple.

original: dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du 'dug pa la sogs pa ma yin par nyi ma nub pa nyid la nyi ma nub pa nyid du 'du shes bzhin du dge slong ma la ston na nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro
analyzed: dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du 'dug pa la sogs pa ma yin par nyi ma nub pa nyid la nyi ma nub pa nyid du 'du shes bzhin du dge slong ma la ston na nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro
translated: Here, the actual basis of a downfall is as follows: Except for a monk who teaches the doctrine throughout the night, if a monk teaches a nun when the sun has set, not in a temple with the door open, or in a nunnery, and so on, and he perceives that it is sunset, then he commits the actual basis of a downfall that requires confession alone.

original: // dge slong mtshan thog thag tu chos ston pa ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: // dge slong mtshan thog thag tu chos ston pa ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: Except for a monk who teaches the doctrine throughout the night, there is no fault.

original: dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gi sgo phye ba'i mdun na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang 'dug pa la sogs pa ma yin pha la na smad pa mad do //
analyzed: dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gi sgo phye ba'i mdun na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang 'dug pa la sogs pa ma yin pha la na smad pa mad do //
translated: Except for a monk who teaches the doctrine throughout the night, there is no fault if he teaches in a temple with the door open, not in a nunnery, and so on.

original: nyi ma nub pa nyid la nyi ma nub pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / yid gnyis za ba la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: nyi ma nub pa nyid la nyi ma nub pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / yid gnyis za ba la na smad pa med do //
translated: There is no fault if he perceives that it is not sunset, or if he is unsure of it.

original: dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs pa can ma nyams pa gcig la sogs pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs pa can ma nyams pa gcig la sogs pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if the nun is fully ordained, not degenerate, and so on.

original: lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab nyid du gtogs pa ston pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab nyid du gtogs pa ston pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if the teaching is on superior morality, superior mind, or superior wisdom.

original: 'di'i byed pa po ni nyi ma nub pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no /
analyzed: 'di'i byed pa po ni nyi ma nub pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no /
translated: The main factor in this downfall is the perception that the sun has set.

original: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /🔽dge slong mtshan thog thag tu chos ston pa ma yin pa dang / dge slong gis gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i mdun na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang 'dug pa la sogs pa ma yin pa dang / nyi ma nub pa nyid dang / der 'du @97a * //
analyzed: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te / dge slong mtshan thog thag tu chos ston pa ma yin pa dang / dge slong gis gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i mdun na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang 'dug pa la sogs pa ma yin pa dang / nyi ma nub pa nyid dang / der 'du @97a * //
translated: The actual downfall is committed by five factors:

original: shes pa nyid dang / dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa nyid dang / dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
translated: the monk is not a teacher of the doctrine for the whole night; the nun is not staying in a nunnery in front of the door of the monk’s temple; the sun has set; the monk has the perception that the sun has set; the monk teaches the nun.

original: de dag nyid las yan lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
analyzed: de dag nyid las yan lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
translated: If any of these factors is missing, there is a corresponding partial defeat.

original: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
translated: The infraction of preparation is a minor offense.

original: ji srid du nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
analyzed: ji srid du nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
translated: As long as the sun has not set, if one begins the preparation for the offense of teaching a nun, but does not reach the actual basis, it is a minor offense.

original: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
analyzed: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
translated: For each of the many preparations for the actual basis that one begins, there is one minor offense.

original: nyi ma nub pa nyid la nyi ma nub pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / yid gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
analyzed: nyi ma nub pa nyid la nyi ma nub pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / yid gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
translated: If the sun has set, but one perceives that it has not set, or one is unsure of it, it is a minor offense.

original: dge slong ma ma chags pa dang nyams pa la nyes byas so //
analyzed: dge slong ma ma chags pa dang nyams pa la nyes byas so //
translated: If the nun is not attached or has lost her status, it is a minor offense.

original: mtshan mi mthun pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la nyes byas so //
analyzed: mtshan mi mthun pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la nyes byas so //
translated: If the gender is not the same, and she is not fully ordained, it is a minor offense.

original: lung nyid ma yin pa ston pa la nyes byas so //
analyzed: lung nyid ma yin pa ston pa la nyes byas so //
translated: If one teaches without the transmission, it is a minor offense.

original: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
translated: The infraction of preparation of preparation is a very minor offense.

original: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
analyzed: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
translated: As many preparations as there are, there are that many preparations of preparation.

original: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
translated: The preparation is a misdeed, and the application is also a misdeed, which is a minor offense.

original: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong mtshan thog thag tu chos ston pa yin na ltung ba med do //
analyzed: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong mtshan thog thag tu chos ston pa yin na ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if the monk teaches the Dharma all night,🔽and if the nun’s dwelling place is in front of the open door of the monk’s temple, and so on, and if the nun can quickly arrive at her own dwelling without hesitation,

original: dge slong gis gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i mdun na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang 'dug pa la sogs pa dang dge slong ma myur du thags thogs med par rang gi gnas su phyin par rung ba'i gnas dang / dge slong ma'i dbyar khang nyid dang /
analyzed: dge slong gis gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i mdun na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang 'dug pa la sogs pa dang dge slong ma myur du thags thogs med par rang gi gnas su phyin par rung ba'i gnas dang / dge slong ma'i dbyar khang nyid dang /
translated: and if the nun’s dwelling place is in the temple,

original: dge slong ma rnams kyi grong mtha'i gtsug lag khang dang / khang khyim dag tu ston pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: dge slong ma rnams kyi grong mtha'i gtsug lag khang dang / khang khyim dag tu ston pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: and if the monk teaches in the nunnery or in the houses of the town, there is no offense.

original: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do /
analyzed: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do /
translated: There is no offense for a beginner, or if one is insane, deranged, or in pain from illness.

original: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
translated: The training rule is that a fully ordained monk should train by not teaching any aspect of the teachings to anyone in any situation until sunset.

original: grong dang gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du mi bstan par bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: grong dang gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du mi bstan par bslab par bya'o //
translated: He should train by not teaching outside the monastery or the town.

original: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The amendment is the same as before.

original: nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gnyis pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gnyis pa bshad zin to /
translated: This was the twenty-second downfall with an action that is fully reparable.🔽The downfall of teaching for a little food

original: // / zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs @97b so //
analyzed: // / zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs @97b so //
translated: The Buddha, the Blessed One of the Śākya clan, was staying in Śrāvastī, in Prince Jeta’s grove, in the grove given by Anāthapiṇḍada.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la dga' byed khyed kyis dge slong ma la thoms shig / dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig / dge slong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la dga' byed khyed kyis dge slong ma la thoms shig / dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig / dge slong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas /
translated: You speak Dharma words to the nuns.”

original: dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta ma'i 'khor lnga brgya dang tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed gal ba der song ste /
analyzed: dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta ma'i 'khor lnga brgya dang tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed gal ba der song ste /
translated: Then the venerable Mahāprajāpatī Gautamī, together with a retinue of five hundred nuns, went to where the venerable Nandaka was.

original: phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
analyzed: phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
translated: When they arrived, they bowed their heads at the feet of the venerable Nandaka and sat to one side.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis de la don dang tshig dang yi ge zab pa zab pa dag gis chos bstan to//
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis de la don dang tshig dang yi ge zab pa zab pa dag gis chos bstan to//
translated: Then the venerable Nandaka taught the Dharma to them with profound meanings, phrases, and letters.

original: bud med ni shes rab 'chal ba'i phyir brda mi phrad cing /
analyzed: bud med ni shes rab 'chal ba'i phyir brda mi phrad cing /
translated: Because women are of little wisdom, they do not understand the meaning.

original: 'jigs pa'i phyir 'dri mi nus so //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i phyir 'dri mi nus so //
translated: Because they are afraid, they are unable to ask questions.

original: de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta ma'i bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu yin pas dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la bca' lnga po rtsa ba dang /
analyzed: de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta ma'i bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu yin pas dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la bca' lnga po rtsa ba dang /
translated: Then Mahāprajāpatī Gautamī went before the Bhagavān and made a request, and the Bhagavān said, “Giving is the cause of fearlessness.

original: sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu dag dang / bza' ba lnga po 'bras chan dang / zan dron dang / 'dag gu dang / sha dang / snum khur dag dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang /
analyzed: sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu dag dang / bza' ba lnga po 'bras chan dang / zan dron dang / 'dag gu dang / sha dang / snum khur dag dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang /
translated: Therefore, bhikṣuṇīs should offer the five roots—roots, stems, leaves, flowers, and fruits—and the five foods—rice, barley, beans, meat, and oil—and also alms bowls, Dharma robes, and nets to the bhikṣus.

original: phor bu dang / shur bu dang / lcag pod dang / shur bu phre'u dang / rgya cang dag gis kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong ma dag kha cig gis ni 'o thug / kha cig gis ni zho thug / kha cig gis ni hvags kyi la du dag khyer te rgyal byed kyi tshal du tshe dang
analyzed: phor bu dang / shur bu dang / lcag pod dang / shur bu phre'u dang / rgya cang dag gis kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong ma dag kha cig gis ni 'o thug / kha cig gis ni zho thug / kha cig gis ni hvags kyi la du dag khyer te rgyal byed kyi tshal du tshe dang
translated: Some of the nuns brought rice porridge, some brought yogurt porridge, and some brought gruel. They came to the Jetavana and offered them to Venerable Nandaja.

original: ldan pa dga' byed la 'bul du 'ongs pa nye dgas mthong nas smras pa /
analyzed: ldan pa dga' byed la 'bul du 'ongs pa nye dgas mthong nas smras pa /
translated: Upagupta saw them and said,

original: nye dgas kyang gal te 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur na /
analyzed: nye dgas kyang gal te 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur na /
translated: “If I were to obtain such things,

original: rtag pa kho nar dge slong ma la ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag pa kho nar dge slong ma la ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: I would always teach the nuns.”

original: kho bo tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed chos bzang po'i chos kyis dge slong ma la ston snyam gyi kho bo tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston snyam mi sems so zhes zer nas /
analyzed: kho bo tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed chos bzang po'i chos kyis dge slong ma la ston snyam gyi kho bo tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston snyam mi sems so zhes zer nas /
translated: “I think that Venerable Nandaja teaches the nuns because of his good qualities, not because of a little food.”

original: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces /
analyzed: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces /
translated: Why do the monks who have few wants say to the monks, The monks

original: dge slong dag zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la @98a * //🔽ston par byed ces zer zhes smod par byed /
analyzed: dge slong dag zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la @98a * // ston par byed ces zer zhes smod par byed /
translated: are teaching the nuns for the sake of just a little food?🔽They disparage,

original: phyar ka gtong bar byed /
analyzed: phyar ka gtong bar byed /
translated: criticize, and spread it about, saying,

original: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
analyzed: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
translated: The monks reported this matter to the Blessed One.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
translated: Then the Blessed One, because of this event, because of this cause, because of this matter, assembled the community of monks and

original: nye dga' la rmas nas /🔽dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
analyzed: nye dga' la rmas nas / dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
translated: asked Upāli,🔽It is not the way of a śramaṇa,

original: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
translated: it is not the way of a dharma follower,

original: rung ba ma yin pa /
analyzed: rung ba ma yin pa /
translated: it is not suitable,

original: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
analyzed: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
translated: it is not proper for one gone forth to do such a thing.

original: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /🔽yang dge slong gang /
analyzed: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste / yang dge slong gang /
translated: Having seen the ten benefits of establishing the training rules, I declare to my disciples that the basis of the training in the monastic code should be proclaimed in this way.🔽What is the basis of the training?

original: dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces /
analyzed: dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces /
translated: The Buddha declared: “Any monk who says to other monks,

original: dge slong dag gis zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston to zhes zer na ltung phyed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
analyzed: dge slong dag gis zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston to zhes zer na ltung phyed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
translated: ‘The monks teach the nuns for the sake of a little food,’ commits an offense entailing suspension.”

original: yul ni mnyan yod /
analyzed: yul ni mnyan yod /
translated: The location is Śrāvastī.

original: gang zag ni nye dga'/
analyzed: gang zag ni nye dga'/
translated: The person is the monk Upananda.

original: nyon mongs pa ni phrag dog / nyes pa ni phyar ka gtong ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni phrag dog / nyes pa ni phyar ka gtong ba'o //
translated: The affliction is jealousy. The offense is disparaging.

original: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
translated: In this case, “any monk” means the Śākya Upananda or anyone else like him.

original: dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “To other monks” means

original: chos 'di ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ba rnams la'o //
translated: to those who follow this doctrine.

original: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
translated: “Says” means “says this.”

original: dge slong dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag go //
analyzed: dge slong dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag go //
translated: “The monks” means those who follow this doctrine.

original: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'i phyir ro //
translated: “For the sake of a little food” means for the sake of the five cooked foods and the five foods that are not cooked.

original: dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
translated: “A nun” means a follower of this Dharma.

original: ston to zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni lhag pha'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab bo /
analyzed: ston to zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni lhag pha'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab bo /
translated: “Teaches” means the higher morality, the higher mind, and the higher wisdom.

original: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: “Offense” means as before.

original: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the offense here?

original: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, the offense is to be understood by the characteristics of the basic offense, the preparation, the preparation for the preparation, the non-offense, the training, and the amendment.

original: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gis dge slong zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa ma yin pa la /
analyzed: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gis dge slong zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa ma yin pa la /
translated: Here, the basic offense is when a monk, for the sake of a little food, teaches a nun who is not a teacher.

original: dge slong 'di kha zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong @98b ma la ston to zhes nge nyid dam gzhan nyid la smra na /
analyzed: dge slong 'di kha zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong @98b ma la ston to zhes nge nyid dam gzhan nyid la smra na /
translated: If he says to that nun, “I will teach you,” or if he says to someone else, “I will teach this nun,”

original: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
